projectsList.title: Food ordering web
projectsList.description: A food ordering web that enables customers to view the menu, search dishes, order for delivery or pickup, pay through a local payment gateway, and keep track of the status of the order

projectsList.title: Administration dashboard
projectsList.description: A dashboard that allows administrators of the business to manage the products, categories, customers, orders, delivery areas, schedules and general preferences

projectsList.title: This portfolio
projectsList.description: Developed with Next.js, styled with CSS Modules. Includes internationalization with SSG and animations on demand, using Intersection Observer, ensuring compatibility with a polyfill

projectsList.title: Mobile POS
projectsList.description: Flutter application, that integrates with SambaPOS(a desktop POS) through their GraphQL API, it was one of my first personal projects

projectsList.title: Ecommerce Backend
projectsList.description: An API that exposes several endpoints to communicate a postgresql database with both customers and administration apps.

projectsList.title: Movies API
projectsList.description: A challenge that I did in order to put in practice what I've learned about Node.js, Express and MongoDB, consist of a CRUD that let users manipulate movies
